body_html: Those issues are almost 2 years old, but if we want the devel to have 3.0 we can add it back but if you are building from source, which is the purpose of that docker, you would set TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES to the GPU types you are using. My motivation was to update it to match the binary release which starts at 3.5.
body_text: Those issues are almost 2 years old, but if we want the devel to have 3.0 we can add it back but if you are building from source, which is the purpose of that docker, you would set TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES to the GPU types you are using.  My motivation was to update it to match the binary release which starts at 3.5.
body: Those issues are almost 2 years old, but if we want the devel to have 3.0 we can add it back but if you are building from source, which is the purpose of that docker, you would set TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES to the GPU types you are using.  My motivation was to update it to match the binary release which starts at 3.5.
